articles.description: The batter displays a range of skills to make his highest score in ODIs
articles.content: Shreyas 113*, Kishan 93 give India dominating win in Ranchi and level series 1-1

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Dhawan's ‘thanks Maharaj’ remark after India's win leaves everyone in splits - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Shreyas Iyer and Ishan Kishan turned the game around for India as the chase was wrapped up with 4.1 overs to spare. But for Dhawan, he rather credited South Africa's stand-in skipper Keshav Maharaj for the win. | Cricket
articles.content: It was a clinical win from the second-strong Indian side as they bounced back in the three-match series to level it at 1-1 following an impressive seven-wicket win in Ranchi against South Africa. 278… [+1911 chars]

articles.author: Abhimanyu Bose
articles.title: Iker Casillas Says Account Hacked After Deleting Tweet Saying "I'm Gay" - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Taking to Twitter, Iker Casillas had written in Spanish "I hope you respect me: I'm gay." However, he went on to delete the tweet within hours. and then issued a clarification.
articles.content: Legendary Spain and Real Madrid goalkeeper Iker Casillas said his account was hacked after he tweeted saying he was gay and then deleting the post within hours. Taking to Twitter, he had written in S… [+1521 chars]
